Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy begins his reign as Wales manager against Turkey in the 2024/25 UEFA Nations League.
Turkey reached the quarter-finals of UEFA EURO 2024, showcasing an exciting and young group of talent under Vincenzo Montella.
Aaron Ramsey remains the captain for Wales.
Merih Demiral is suspended for Turkey, and Hakan Calhanoglu and Semih Kilicsoy are injury concerns.
Predicted line-ups for both teams have been provided.
